text: aur jo log apane rab ka dar rakhate the, ve giroh ke giroh jannat kee or le jaenge, yahaan tak ki jab ve vahaan pahunchenge is haal mein ki usake dvaar khule honge. aur usake praharee unase kahenge, "salaam ho tumapar! bahut achchhe rahe! atah isamen pravesh karo sadaiv rahane ke lie to (unakee khushiyon ka kya haal hoga)
